original_text: And he cast stones at David, and at all the servants of king David: and all the people and all the mighty men were on his right hand and on his left.
korean_text: 또 다윗과 다윗 왕의 모든 신하들을 향하여 돌을 던지니 그 때에 모든 백성과 용사들은 다 왕의 좌우에 있었더라

sentences.original_text: And he cast stones at David
and at all the servants of king David
sentences.korean_translation: 왕 다윗의 모든 신하에게도 돌을 던졌다

sentences.original_text: and all the people and all the mighty men
were on his right hand and on his left
